mapper.select: SELECT MIN(device_id) device_id, MIN(stats_date) stats_date, MIN(stats_hour) stats_hour, SUM(used_duration) used_duration, SUM(stand_duration) stand_duration, SUM(person_time) person_time, SUM(depth_time) depth_time FROM `bl_data_info` WHERE stats_date=#{statsDate} AND stats_hour =#{statsHour} GROUP BY device_id

SELECT MIN(device_id) device_id, MIN(stats_date) stats_date, SUM(used_duration) used_duration, SUM(stand_duration) stand_duration, SUM(person_time) person_time, SUM(depth_time) depth_time FROM `bl_data_device_hour` WHERE stats_date=#{statsDate} GROUP BY device_id

SELECT MIN(device_id) device_id, MIN(stats_date) stats_date, SUM(used_duration) used_duration, SUM(stand_duration) stand_duration, SUM(person_time) person_time, SUM(depth_time) depth_time FROM `bl_data_device_day` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(stats_date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{statsDate} ,'%Y-%m') GROUP BY device_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `bl_data_device_month` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(stats_date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{statsDate} ,'%Y-%m') GROUP BY device_id
